items.one: about how often did you feel tired out for no good reason?
items.two: about how often did you feel nervous?
items.three: about how often did you feel so nervous that nothing could calm you down?
items.four: about how often did you feel hopeless?
items.five: about how often did you feel restless or fidgety?
items.six: about how often did you feel so restless you could not sit still?
items.seven: about how often did you feel depressed?
items.eight: about how often did you feel that everything was an effort?
items.nine: about how often did you feel so sad that nothing could cheer you up?
items.ten: about how often did you feel worthless?
